paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the KCNH2 gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The highest VDA score was 0.83 for the association of gene KCNH2 reference SNP (rs199472936) to Long Qt Syndrome 2.

functional_data.summary: The KCNH2 gene is associated with cardiac arrhythmias and Long QT Syndrome.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: KCNH2 is strongly related to all cardiac side effects that are previously reported as side effects of domperidone.
key_quotes: The highest VDA score was 0.83 for the association of gene KCNH2 reference SNP (rs199472936) to Long Qt Syndrome 2.
It's obvious that KCNH2 is strongly related to all cardiac side effects that are previously reported as side effects of domperidone.

tables_processed.table_caption: Predicted genes for long QT interval caused by domperidone.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for the KCNH2 gene was extracted successfully.
